alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:33PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cullman, southwestern Morgan and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Hartselle, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hartselle, Good Hope, Falkville, Dodge City, Baldwin, Vinemont, West Point, Speake and Cole Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
